title: Finnish Biodiversity Indicators
text: Finnish biodiversity indicators service providing time series abundance indices related biodiversity metrics Finland. input data indices provided Finnish Biodiversity Information Facility Biodiversity indicator birds winter

title: Clean cache — clean_cache
text: Remove unneeded tables rows database cache.

title: Process functions — process_funs
code: process_funs()  shift_year_winter(surveys)  pick_first_survey_in_winter(surveys)  pick_first_survey_in_year(surveys)  require_seven_fortnights(surveys)  require_gt_two_years(surveys)  pick_first_survey_in_fortnight(surveys)  format_date(surveys)  combine_with_surveys(counts, surveys, ...)  zero_fill(counts, surveys, ...)  remove_all_zero_locations(counts, ...)  sum_over_sections(counts, ...)  sum_taxa_over_sections(counts, ...)  sum_by_event(counts, ...)  sum_taxa_by_event(counts, ...)  set_start_year(counts, taxon, ...)

title: Process functions — process_funs
text: surveys Survey data. counts Count data. ... Additional arguments. taxon Taxon configuration.

title: Update data — update_data
code: update_data(type, index, taxon, db, do_update = FALSE)

title: Update data — update_data
text: type Character. type input data (e.g., surveys counts) index Character. Update data index? taxon Character. Update data taxon? Ignored type = "surveys" db Connection. Database update data FinBIF. do_update Logical. Update data regardless need.

title: Update index — update_index
text: index Character. Update index? model Character. model use? db Connection. Database update index.

text: index Character. Update index? model Character. model use? taxon Character. Update data taxa? db Connection. Database update index.
